question: Which virus is Cidofovir (Vistide) indicated for?
ideal_answer: Cidofovir is commonly used in the treatment of cytomegalovirus (CMV) infection and disease.

snippets.text: Currently, there are four antivirals available that are active against CMV: ganciclovir, valganciclovir, foscarnet, and cidofovir.
At present, the antiviral drugs ganciclovir, foscarnet and cidofovir are commonly used in the treatment of CMV infection and disease.
Cidofovir can be considered as second-line therapy in patients with CMV disease failing previous antiviral therapy.
dditional drugs like lobucavir and cidofovir have been used for specific indications.
